authorize.description:
Make sure that «Control remotely» is enabled on your TV, go to: 
Settings -> Network -> Remote device settings -> Control remotely. 

There are two authorization methods: PIN code or PSK (Pre-Shared Key). 
Authorization via PSK is recommended as more stable.
authorize.title: Authorize Sony Bravia TV

confirm.description: Do you want to start setup?

pin.description:
Enter the PIN code shown on the Sony Bravia TV. 

If the PIN code is not shown, you have to unregister Home Assistant on your TV, go to: Settings -> Network -> Remote device settings -> Deregister remote device.
pin.title: Authorize Sony Bravia TV

psk.description:
To set up PSK on your TV, go to: Settings -> Network -> Home Network Setup -> IP Control. Set «Authentication» to «Normal and Pre-Shared Key» or «Pre-Shared Key» and define your Pre-Shared-Key string (e.g. sony). 

Then enter your PSK here.
psk.title: Authorize Sony Bravia TV
